attributes.additional_details:
Enough is enough, Tranmere Rovers nor do the supporters deserve to be a conference club. Adams is incompetent at his job which will ultimately result in us becoming a part time club. If you truly love Tranmere Rovers please sign this petition. Adams needs to go, bring somebody else in who can lift the dressing room spark a bit of belief and fight into the players.

Together we can stay up. Show your support and sign this #AdamsOut
